mapper.select: select * from item_table where item_category_index = 1 and item_subcategory_index = #{subcategoryIndex}
select count(*) from review_table where item_index = #{itemIndex}
select count(*) from ask_table where item_index = #{itemIndex}
mapper.insert: insert into review_table(item_index, user_id, title, content, star_rating, image_file) values(#{itemIndex}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{starRating}, #{imageFile})
insert into ask_table(ask_group_index, ask_group_level, user_id, title, content, image_file) values(#{askGroupIndex}, #{askGroupLevel}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imageFile})
